title: Gauge Watch Face
summary: Gauge Watch Face is an interactive digital and analog watch face with 9 features
description: Gauge Watch Face is an interactive watch face with advanced customization for Android Wear! It combines both analog and digital watch to let you match your taste. Works on both circle and square watches.This watch face lets you choose between many options.Gauge Watch Face Feature:- Advanced On-screen Interactivity- Change Color of Every Element- 3 Background Styles- 4 Hands Styles (incl. turning hands off)- 4 Fully Customizable Dialers- Weather, Steps, Meetings- 5 Day Steps Scala- 3 Day Weather Forecast- Chronometer- Next Meeting Title- App Launcher- Default and 3rd Party Complications- Customizable Ambient Mode!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 AND GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS)Gauge Watch Face works as Standalone app on Android Wear 2.0 watch paired with Appel iOS! In this case only Complications are available. To get all customization features please install companion application on Android Phone!The SETTINGS of the watch face are located in the Android Wear App of your handheld device.Press the Gear Icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will open! You can also open the settings directly from your app drawer!If the installation does not happen automatically on either of the devices, please visit Play Store and search for Gauge Watch Face.Compatibility:- LG Watch Sport, LG Watch Style, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch Urbane, LG G Watch Urbane 2, LG G Watch R, Moto 360 and Moto 360 2, Fossil Q Founder, Tag Heuer Connected- ASUS ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch- MK Access, Nixon The Mission, Polar M600, New Balance RunIQ, Fossil Q, Casio WatchesDon't forget to check our other watches! :)https://goo.gl/Tr3kjlIf you don't like Gauge Watch Face please refund or ask for refund. descriptionHTML:
Gauge Watch Face is an interactive watch face with advanced customization for Android Wear!
It combines both analog and digital watch to let you match your taste. Works on both circle and square watches.

This watch face lets you choose between many options.

Gauge Watch Face Feature:
- Advanced On-screen Interactivity
- Change Color of Every Element
- 3 Background Styles
- 4 Hands Styles (incl. turning hands off)
- 4 Fully Customizable Dialers
- Weather, Steps, Meetings
- 5 Day Steps Scala
- 3 Day Weather Forecast
- Chronometer
- Next Meeting Title
- App Launcher
- Default and 3rd Party Complications
- Customizable Ambient Mode


!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 AND GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS)


Gauge Watch Face works as Standalone app on Android Wear 2.0 watch paired with Appel iOS! In this case only Complications are available. To get all customization features please install companion application on Android Phone!

The SETTINGS of the watch face are located in the Android Wear App of your handheld device.
Press the Gear Icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will open!

You can also open the settings directly from your app drawer!

If the installation does not happen automatically on either of the devices, please visit Play Store and search for Gauge Watch Face.


Compatibility:
- LG Watch Sport, LG Watch Style, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch Urbane, LG G Watch Urbane 2, LG G Watch R, Moto 360 and Moto 360 2, Fossil Q Founder, Tag Heuer Connected
- ASUS ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch
- MK Access, Nixon The Mission, Polar M600, New Balance RunIQ, Fossil Q, Casio Watches


Don't forget to check our other watches! :)
https://goo.gl/Tr3kjl


If you don't like Gauge Watch Face please refund or ask for refund. Any low rating without constructive feedback is not helping making this application better.


Please contact us on angcorp.dev@gmail.com for any issue that you may have with Gauge Watch Face and we'll try to resolve it as soon as possible!
Also let us know what you think of our product in the comment section below :)

comments: Weather seems inaccurate by a long shot. It's close to 80 here and the app says 71. The forecast for the next three days is mid to upper 70s but the app says 60s
Steps and battery gauges don't seem to be refreshing.
I like Gauge a lot! Great watch face with so many and so nice customization features!
Amazing watch face.  The level of customization is of highest level! Recommended
It is a nice watch face with plenty of customization options

Awesome watch face. The level of customization is amazing - you can make it look sporty or classical or even funny. The weather and steps features are nice and the interctivity provides easy access to everything needed!  Highly recommended!
